maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastjobwrapper.cpp
/*

provided at the time of installation or download, or which otherwise 
accompanies this software in either electronic or hard copy form.

#include "beastwrappers/beastjobwrapper.h"

#include <beastapi/beasttarget.h>
#include "beastwrappers/beasttargetwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastcamerawrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastrenderpasswrapper.h"

namespace beastmaya {

BeastTargetPtr BeastJob::createTextureTarget( ILBConstString name, int32 width, int32 height )
{
        ILBTargetHandle handle;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateTextureTarget(obj(), name, width, height, &handle));
        return BeastTargetPtr(new BeastTarget(handle));
}

BeastTargetPtr BeastJob::createAtlasedTextureTarget( ILBConstString name, int32 maxWidth, int32 maxHeight, int32 maxTextures, bool rescale, float threshold )
{
        ILBTargetHandle handle;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateAtlasedTextureTarget(obj(), name, maxWidth, maxHeight, maxTextures, &handle));
        if (rescale) {
                BEAST_CALL(ILBEnableAtlasRescale(handle));
                BEAST_CALL(ILBSetAtlasRescaleFrequencyThreshold(handle, threshold));
        }
        return BeastTargetPtr(new BeastTarget(handle));
}

BeastTargetPtr BeastJob::createVertexTarget( ILBConstString name )
{
        ILBTargetHandle handle;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateVertexTarget(obj(), name, &handle));
        return BeastTargetPtr(new BeastTarget(handle));
}

BeastTargetPtr BeastJob::createCameraTarget( ILBConstString name, BeastCamera& camera, int32 width, int32 height, bool cameraRender )
{
        ILBTargetHandle handle;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateCameraTarget(obj(), name, camera.obj(), width, height, &handle));
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCameraTargetSetRenderMode(handle, cameraRender?ILB_LEC_CAMERA_PER_PIXEL_LIGHTING:ILB_LEC_CAMERA_LIGHT_MAP_LIGHTING));
        return BeastTargetPtr(new BeastTarget(handle));
}

BeastRenderPassPtr BeastJob::createFullShadingPass( ILBConstString name )
{
        ILBRenderPassHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateFullShadingPass(obj(), name, &h));
        return BeastRenderPassPtr(new BeastRenderPass(h));
}

BeastRenderPassPtr BeastJob::createIlluminationPass( ILBConstString name, ILBIlluminationMode mode )
{
        ILBRenderPassHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateIlluminationPass(obj(), name, mode, &h));
        return BeastRenderPassPtr(new BeastRenderPass(h));
}

BeastRenderPassPtr BeastJob::createLuaPass( ILBConstString name, ILBConstString script )
{
        ILBRenderPassHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateLuaPass(obj(), name, script, &h));
        return BeastRenderPassPtr(new BeastRenderPass(h));
}

BeastAmbientOcclusionPassPtr BeastJob::createAmbientOcclusionPass( ILBConstString name, float maxDistance, float coneAngle )
{
        ILBRenderPassHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateAmbientOcclusionPass(obj(), name, maxDistance, coneAngle, &h));
        return BeastAmbientOcclusionPassPtr(new BeastAmbientOcclusionPass(h));
}

BeastLightPassPtr BeastJob::createLightPass( ILBConstString name, ILBLightPassType type )
{
        ILBRenderPassHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateLightPass(obj(), name, type, &h));
        return BeastLightPassPtr(new BeastLightPass(h));
}

BeastRNMPassPtr BeastJob::createRNMPass( ILBConstString name, ILBIlluminationMode mode, ILBRNMBasis basis )
{
        ILBRenderPassHandle h;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateRNMPass(obj(), name, mode, 0, basis, &h));
        return BeastRNMPassPtr(new BeastRNMPass(h));
}

void BeastJob::start( ILBShowResults sr, ILBDistributionType dt )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBStartJob(obj(), sr, dt));
}

void BeastJob::waitDone( int timeout )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBWaitJobDone(obj(), timeout));
}

bool BeastJob::isRunning()
{
        ILBBool isRunning = true;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBIsJobRunning(obj(), &isRunning));
        return (isRunning != 0);
}

ILBJobStatus BeastJob::getResult()
{
        ILBJobStatus res;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetJobResult(obj(), &res));
        return res;
}

bool BeastJob::hasUpdate()
{
        ILBBool hasUpdate;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetJobUpdate(obj(), &hasUpdate, &m_uh));
        return (hasUpdate != 0);
}

ILBUpdateType BeastJob::updateType()
{
        ILBUpdateType updateType;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetJobUpdateType(m_uh, &updateType));
        return updateType;
}

ILBJobUpdateHandle BeastJob::getUpdateHandle() {
        return m_uh;
}

void BeastJob::destroyUpdate()
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBDestroyUpdate(m_uh));
}

bool BeastJob::hasProgress(bool& newActivity, bool& newProgress) {
        ILBBool _newActivity, _newProgress;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBJobHasNewProgress(obj(), &_newActivity, &_newProgress));
        newActivity = _newActivity != 0;
        newProgress = _newProgress != 0;
        return newActivity || newProgress;
}

void BeastJob::getProgress(std::wstring& taskName, int& progress) {
        ILBStringHandle _taskName;
        int32 _progress;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetJobProgress(obj(), &_taskName, &_progress));
        taskName = BeastString(_taskName).asWString();
        progress = _progress;
}

void BeastJob::setErnstDisplayGamma( float displayGamma ) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetErnstDisplayGamma(obj(), displayGamma));
}

void BeastJob::setErnstDirectIllumination( float scale )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetErnstDirectIllumination(obj(), scale));
}

void BeastJob::setErnstIndirectIllumination( float scale )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetErnstIndirectIllumination(obj(), scale));
}

void BeastJob::setErnstDiffuseBoost( float boost )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetErnstGIDiffuseBoost(obj(), boost));
}

void BeastJob::setErnstEmissiveScale( float scale )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetErnstGIEmissiveScale(obj(), scale));
}

void BeastJob::setRenderMaxDepth(int depth) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetErnstGIDepth(obj(), 1, depth));
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetJobRenderDepth(obj(), 1, depth));
}

void BeastJob::setRenderQuality(float quality) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetJobRenderQuality(obj(), quality));
}

void BeastJob::setRenderSamples(int minSamples, int maxSamples, float varianceThreshold) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetJobRenderSamples(obj(), minSamples, maxSamples, varianceThreshold));
}

beastmaya::BeastTargetPtr BeastJob::createUVUnwrapTarget( ILBConstString name, float texelPerWorldUnit, float segmentationThreshold, float unwrapFlatness, float straightness, float compactness ) {
        ILBTargetHandle handle;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBCreateUVUnwrapTarget(obj(), name, texelPerWorldUnit, &handle));
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetUVUnwrapSegmentationThreshold(handle, segmentationThreshold));
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetUVUnwrapFlatness(handle, unwrapFlatness));
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetUVUnwrapStraightness(handle, straightness));
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetUVUnwrapCompactness(handle, compactness));
        return BeastTargetPtr(new BeastTarget(handle));
}

void BeastJob::setErnstVarianceThreshold(float threshold) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetErnstVarianceThreshold(obj(), threshold));
}

void BeastJob::setCausticsMode(ECausticsModeType mode) {
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetCausticsMode(obj(), (ILBCausticsModeType)mode));
}


}
